DialogueOption.Text: What exactly are you? And how did you get here?

Dialogue.Page: I'm a bukrad. And I'm a bukrad.
(actually I'm an incomplete model but Shoe was kind enough to provide this wip)
I'm the joke brainchild of Echatsum, who made Callis's Thesis and Misfired Jump for jam3 and jam4 respectively. For jam5 he joined the Signal Jammers team to make the Cosmic Curators.
There are also rumors he's working on a big mod but it's still in the very early stages of development. Stay tuned for an expected 2040 release!
